mapper.select: SELECT cg.cg_num AS challengeCode, cg.mbr_id AS memberId, cg.cg_name AS challengeName, cg.cg_picture AS challengePicture, cg.cg_content AS challengeContent, cg.cg_start_date AS challengeStartDate, cg.cg_end_date AS challengeEndDate, cg.cg_current_mbr_count AS challengeCurrentMember, cg.cg_max_mbr_count AS challengeMaxMember, stl.ctl_level AS challengeTopicLevel, stl.ctl_content AS challengeLevelContent, ct.ct_num AS challengeTopicCode, ct.ct_name AS challengeCategory, cs.cs_status AS challengeStatus, m.mbr_image AS challengeLeaderImage, cg.cg_leader_name AS challengeLeaderName FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level stl ON stl.ctl_num = cg.ctl_num INNER JOIN challenge_status cs ON cs.cs_num = cg.cs_num INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct ON ct.ct_num = stl.ct_num LEFT JOIN member m ON m.mbr_id = cg.mbr_id ORDER BY cg.cg_start_date DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge_group( cg_num AS challengeCode, ctl_num AS challengeTopicLevelCode, cg_leader_name AS challengeLeaderName, cg_name AS challengeName, cg_picture AS challengePicture, cg_content AS challengeContent, cg_creation_date AS challengeCreationDate, cg_current_mbr_count AS challengeCurrentMember, cg_max_mbr_count AS challengeMaxMember, cg_start_date AS challengeStartDate, cg_end_date AS challengeEndDate, cg_like AS challengeGroupLike, cs_num AS challengeStatusCode, mbr_id AS memberId, cs_reward_check AS challengeRewardCheck ) VALUES ( #{ChallengeCode}, -- 생성 시, 자동으로 1씩 증가 #{challengeTopicLevelCode}, -- 난이도 선택 시, 매칭되는 코드값 가져옴 #{challengeLeaderName}, -- mbr에서 매칭되는 이름 가져오기 #{challengeName}, #{challengePicture}, -- url 연결 작업 #{challengeContent}, CURDATE(), -- 생성 버튼 클릭 시, 현재 날짜 #{challengeCurrentMember}, -- 현재 멤버 수(최소5인) #{challengeMaxMember}, -- 챌린지 생성 시, 선택 가능한 최대 멤버(최대 20인) #{challengeStartDate}, -- 조건 충족 시, 챌린지가 시작하는 일자 #{challengeEndDate}, -- 조건 충족 시, 끝나는 일자 #{challengeGroupLike}, -- 아이디 중복 체크 후, 카운트 #{challengeStatusCode}, -- 생성 시, 진행중(cs_002)이 기본값 #{memberId}, #{challengeRewardCheck} -- null 허용 );
mapper.select: /* 챌린지 리스트 총 갯수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM challenge_group

SELECT cg.cg_num AS challengeCode, cg.cg_name AS challengeName, cg.cg_picture AS challengePicture, m.mbr_image AS challengeLeaderImage, m.mbr_id AS challengeLeaderName, cg.cg_start_date AS challengeStartDate, cg.cg_end_date AS challengeEndDate, ctl.ctl_level AS challengeTopicLevel, ct.ct_name AS challengeCategory, cg.cg_current_mbr_count AS challengeCurrentMember, cg.cg_max_mbr_count AS challengeMaxMember, cg.cg_content AS challengeContent, cg.cg_leader_name AS challengeLeaderName, cg.cg_creation_date AS challengeCreationDate, cs.cs_num AS challengeStatusCode, ctl.ctl_content AS challengeLevelContent, cg.cs_reward_check AS challengeLevelContent FROM challenge_group cg INNER JOIN member m ON m.mbr_id = cg.mbr_id INNER JOIN challenge_topic_level ctl ON ctl.ctl_num = cg.ctl_num INNER JOIN challenge_topic ct ON ct.ct_num = ctl.ct_num INNER JOIN challenge_status cs ON cs.cs_num = cg.cs_num WHERE cg.cg_num = 'cg_001' -- #{challengeCode};
